long_description: The Sportz Truck Tent is the ultimate adventure accessory for impromptu camping events, tailgate parties, family vacations or wherever your wheels take you. Truck Tent assembles in the back of your open-bed pickup, creating a comfortable, restful sleeping area for 2 people. Interior space offers more than 5 ft. of headroom. Rear panel allows you to access your truck's cab. Water-resistant sewn-in floor and full-coverage rainfly protect you from wet weather. 2 large windows and 2 vents provide excellent cross-ventilation. Color-coded pole and sleeve system offers a fast, easy setup. 4 x 4 ft. shade awning secures to the tailgate; awning poles included. 1 interior pocket. Expandable carrying bag for easy storage and transport; includes 4 tent stakes and guy cord. Please see Size Chart for compatible truck models.
